lead_paragraph: Five people were arrested in connection with the escape of three inmates from a maximum-security jail in Santa Ana, Calif., last week, but the escapees remain at large.

headline.print_headline: California: 5 Arrested in Jail Break in Orange County
headline.main: California: 5 Arrested in Jail Break in Orange County

snippet: Five people were arrested in connection with the escape of three inmates from a maximum-security jail in Santa Ana, Calif., last week, but the escapees remain at large.
abstract: Sheriff Sandra Hutchens of Orange County announces arrest of five people in connection to maximum-security jail break in Santa Ana, Calif, where three inmates who escaped still remain at large.
